T03bsu028iu:934: ye cāpi śrāvakaguṇā tatha pratyayānāṃ Rgs_25.6a
T03bsu028iu:935: ye 'tīta ye 'pi ca daśaddiśa lokanāthā Rgs_3.5c
T03bsu028iu:936: ye 'tīta ye 'pi ca daśaddiśi lokanāthā Rgs_12.2a

T03bsu028iu:945: yehī samākulikṛtā bahu bhikṣu tatra Rgs_11.8c

T03bsu028iu:952: yo gṛhṇate vrajati pārasthalaṃ prayāti Rgs_14.2d
T03bsu028iu:957: yo dharma bhāṣyati ya bhāṣyati bhāṣyamāṇāṃ Rgs_2.5a
T03bsu028iu:961: yo bodhisattva ayu vyākṛtu vyākṛtasmiṃ Rgs_24.5a
T03bsu028iu:963: yo bodhisattva imi icchati prāpuṇetuṃ Rgs_16.3a
T03bsu028iu:964: yo bodhisattva imu jānati eva śikṣāṃ Rgs_25.2a
T03bsu028iu:965: yo bodhisattva imu budhyati eva dharmāṃ Rgs_18.2a
T03bsu028iu:967: yo bodhisattva parijānati eva dharmāṃ Rgs_1.7c

T03bsu028iu:1011: vijñāna naiva na pi cetanayopalabdhiḥ Rgs_5.2b

T03bsu028iu:1036: vaiḍūryaratna abhibhoti sa sarva eko Rgs_31.17b

T03bsu028iu:1072: śrutvā ca so imu kṣipiṣyati so 'lpabuddhiḥ Rgs_7.6c

T03bsu028iu:1095: satkāyadṛṣṭi yatha ṣaṣṭi duve ca dṛṣṭī Rgs_25.4c
